1.label: Picked Some Violets
1.desc: On a small wooden crate next to the road.

2.label: Upcoming Delivery
2.desc: On the first floor of the barn, on the ground right next to the ladder.

3.label: Violets Are Wilting
3.desc: On a wooden plank in the attic.

4.label: Violets Don't Wilt
4.desc: Inside the hotel safe on the first floor.

5.label: Pests in the Garden
5.desc: On a small wooden table under the gazebo.

6.label: Boches at the Door
6.desc: On a couch on the ground floor.

1.label: Resistance Captured
1.desc: On a wooden crate in the boathouse.

3.label: Lacking Air Support
3.desc: Inside of a safe in the underground bunker. The safe can be opened with the @link[code.1] or a satchel charge.

4.label: Atlantikwall Report
4.desc: Inside of a safe on the ground floor. The safe can be opened with the @link[code.2] or a satchel charge.

1.label: Resistance Photo
1.desc: On top of a wooden table on the first floor.

2.label: Radio Tin
2.desc: On a wooden table near the stables.

3.label: FFI Flag
3.desc: Inside the kitchen on the ground floor.

1.label: Stone Eagle
1.desc: On top of the chimney of a building outside of the map.

2.label: Stone Eagle
2.desc: Above the main entrance of the occupied hotel.

3.label: Stone Eagle
3.desc: On top of the fortification. Visible from the road leading north.

1.label: Rifle Workbench
1.desc: Inside the armoury, right next to the exit.

2.label: SMG Workbench
2.desc: In the attic. Accessible via the vines on either side of the house.

2.label: Bunker Door
2.desc: Can be opened with the @link[key.2] or a satchel charge.

3.label: Armoury Door
3.desc: Can be opened with the @link[key.3] or a satchel charge.

4.label: Generator Room Door
4.desc: Can be opened with the @link[key.4] or a satchel charge. Alternatively, the lock can be picked.

1.label: Radar Trenches
1.desc: Satchel charges can be found in the trenches.

2.label: French Countryside
2.desc: Recon planes suggest this as a suitable infiltration point for this mission.

3.label: Vantage Point
3.desc: Recon planes have spotted a vantage point at this location.

4.label: Town Promenade
4.desc: Recon planes suggest this as a suitable infiltration point for this mission.

desc.2: Option B - Find the Radar's Power Source.
desc.3: Option B - Pull the Circuit Breaker.
Option B - Pull the Circuit Breaker.

desc.1: Find a way to Sabotage or Destroy the Gun Battery.
desc.2: Option A - Sabotage the Power Source
desc.3: Option B - Send a sabotaged shell into the gun.
